channel.title: Dragon Claws
channel.description:
Hello,
So i'm using the re-sizeable galkon's clients, and i have a problem with dragon claws emote and animation, which shows a a dragon breath animation and without any emote I've tried a couple of things like using another client with the same source and it worked fine with another client (using the same source)
So it seems there's a problem with the first client, with dragon claws animations/emotes not sure thought
Anyone can help me with this?
Thanks very much.

item.title: Dragon Claws
